author: breser
msg: Make unix build work with APR-2 (aka trunk)
(): Move all the APR detection inside a CALLOUT_OKAY block since we don't
use any of the results anywhere else that would matter outside of the
CALLOUT_OKAY paths.  Look for an apr-2-config program and if it doesn't
exist fall back to apr-1-config.  Use --version with our apr-?-config
script to find out if we have APR 2 or not and if so do nothing with
APR-Util since it's part of APR now.
